data.name: Puzlkind Jigsaw Puzzles
data.detailed_description:
Jigsaw puzzle fun - on your own, with friends and family, or with new puzzle pals from around the world!

Voice chat lets you feel like you're all sitting around the table. Automatically sort pieces by edges, color, section.

Choose from curated artist-made images or join makers' happy hour with surprise guests from all over the planet!

Features the awesome 3D pieces and realistic puzzle physics you enjoy in our sister app, Puzzle Together.

Contact us to use this app to promote well-being, equity and inclusion, and creative connection for your organization.

data.short_description: Multiplayer jigsaw puzzles with voice chat! Play with original art puzzles on your own or while you laugh, learn, and love with fellow Earthlings.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium 4
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.12+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
